===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|みちのし|rom=Michi no Shi}}

# The fifth-ranked title of the eight ''kabane'' hereditary title rankings created by Emperor Temmu in the year 684. There are no records of this title ever being granted, and it is unclear what the title might have indicated.
